text: Morteza Pashaei ( 13 August 1984 â€“ 14 November 2014) was an Iranian musician, composer and pop singer. He was born in Tehran, Iran. Pashaei was known for his albums Yeki hast, Gole Bita, and Esmesh Eshgheh. On November 14, 2014, Pashaei died from stomach cancer in Tehran, Iran, aged 30.Morteza Pashaei dies ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Iran Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Iranian musicians Category:Iranian singers Category:Iranian composers Category:People from Tehran
